thread.section_title: Hotel Regina Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing hotel at a great price
thread.title_full: Amazing hotel at a great price - Review of Hotel Regina Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Martin H
title: Amazing hotel at a great price
text: Small (but not too small), very atmospheric and well-decorated rooms. The receptionists and general service was sublime and very helpful. The neighborhood was somewhat sketchy, but some people will properly find this delightful, since this is not at all tourist area. We didn't try the breakfast, since it seemed a little pricy.
